mapper.insert: INSERT INTO M01_COMMON ( CODE1 , CODE2 , CODE3 , VALUE ) VALUES ( #{cODE1} , #{cODE2} , #{cODE3} , #{vALUE} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM M01_COMMON WHERE CODE1 = #{cODE1} AND CODE2 = #{cODE2} AND CODE3 = #{cODE3}
mapper.select: SELECT CODE1 AS "cODE1" , CODE2 AS "cODE2" , CODE3 AS "cODE3" , VALUE AS "vALUE" FROM M01_COMMON WHERE CODE1 = #{cODE1} AND CODE2 = #{cODE2} AND CODE3 = #{cODE3}
SELECT CODE1 AS "cODE1" , CODE2 AS "cODE2" , CODE3 AS "cODE3" , VALUE AS "vALUE" FROM M01_COMMON WHERE CODE1 = #{cODE1} AND CODE2 = #{cODE2} AND CODE3 = #{cODE3} FOR UPDATE
